abstract: Ed Shevlin, resident of Rockaways in Queens and scholar of Irish-American history, has delved into story of John Kilgallon, Rockaways native who took part in 1916 Easter Rising rebellion during his sole trip to Ireland; Shevlin's essay on Kilgallon forms chapter of forthcoming book Independent Spirits: American and the Easter Rising.
lead_paragraph: Ed Shevlin, a retired sanitation worker now in a master’s program in Irish studies, has shed new light on a fellow native of Rockaway, Queens, who took part in the 1916 Irish rebellion.

headline.main: Student of Irish Language Brings to Life a Patriot of the Easter Rising
headline.print_headline: Sons of Queens: One Loves Irish History, One Was Part of It

snippet: Ed Shevlin, a retired sanitation worker now in a master’s program in Irish studies, has shed new light on a fellow native of Rockaway, Queens, who took part in the 1916 Irish rebellion.
